author: Karen Belz
title: Hoda Kotb secretly adopted a baby girl, and we’re thrilled for her
text:
Hoda Kotb secretly adopted a baby girl, and we’re thrilled for her Congratulations to the brand new mom! It was just announced that TV host Hoda Kotb adopted a baby girl , and we’re so thrilled for her.
The announcement was made official on the Today’ s Instagram account. In the shared photo of Kotb and her brand new baby girl , named Haley Joy, Kotb is just beaming.
Kotb phoned into the show to share the news, and her co-host, Kathie Lee Gifford , admitted that it was so hard to keep the adoption a secret. (We’re glad that Kotb confided in her, and that Gifford definitely kept her promise!)
“I have the biggest mouth in the world and I’ve said zilch,” Gifford admitted. Welcome to the family, Haley Joy! Hoda announced that she adopted a baby girl. "She is the love of my life." 
A post shared by TODAY (@todayshow) on Feb 21, 2017 at 5:17am PST 
Fans of the show were overjoyed (no pun intended) and flooded Kotb with positive remarks. Shortly after the announcement on Today , Kotb took to her own Instagram account to share a motivational quote that seemed pretty appropriate for the occasion.
Haley joy 
A post shared by Hoda Kotb (@hodakotb) on Feb 21, 2017 at 5:31am PST 
In fact, Kotb — who is a fan of motivational phrases — might have been hinting at a big life change for a few days. Many believe that this post is in reference to little Haley Joy:
Happy sunday ❤❤❤ 
A post shared by Hoda Kotb (@hodakotb) on Feb 18, 2017 at 10:11pm PST 
Kotb has been in a relationship with Joel Schiffman for several years — in fact, this June, they’ll be celebrating their fourth anniversary. Kotb met the financial executive at a Wall Street event she was speaking at, and the rest is history . Schiffman has one daughter from a prior marriage, so we’re sure he’ll be able to lend a helping hand when needed!
We can’t wait to see additional photos and learn more about this beautiful baby!
